reference.title: Build Parameters
reference.shortdesc: As documented in the plugin itself, two build parameters are available.

section.title: args.ditasearch.configs
section.p: Specifies an optional search configuration file containing stopwords, stemming exceptions, and synonyms. This file can be merged with or replace the default configuration.

section.title: args.ditasearch.nohtml
section.p: Omit adding the search HTML to topics if you are including it yourself, for example, in a frameset or custom header and footer. The following values are supported:

ul.li: true – Don’t add the search HTML to topics.
false (default) – The build adds <div class='ditasearch'> to the header and <script src='{path}/ditasearch.js'> to the footer.
